DOC.brief_summary: The study investigates cognitive attention, rumination and psychophysiological (EEG) processes in healthy subjects and remitted patients with at least three previous depressive episodes. The investigators expect that Mindfulness Based Cognitive Therapy prevents future depressive episodes and has influence on cognitive and psychophysiological measures.
DOC.brief_title: Psychophysiological Correlates of Mindfulness Based Cognitive Therapy (MBCT) in Recurrent Depression
DOC.criteria: recurrent depression with at least 3 previous MDepisodes, currently remitted (no symptoms) current depression lifetime schizophrenia bipolar or schizoaffective disorder any neurological disorders other psychopathology during last 3 years
